aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Your reliable solution partner in the industrial packaging sector since 2012.
aboutPage.storyTitle: Built with Quality and Trust 10+ Years
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Meet your business packaging needs with NG Ambalaj, a professional and reliable business partner.
aboutPage.mainContentParagraph1: NG Ambalaj is an industrial packaging materials trading company established in 2012, operating in Adana Organized Industrial Zone in southern Turkey. We work in accordance with the dynamics of the sector, with high quality and sustainable business partnership principles.
aboutPage.mainContentParagraph2: Since our establishment, our main mission has been to provide packaging solutions, especially industrial stretch films (pre-stretched stretch) and PET straps, which optimize the logistics and shipping processes of businesses. Our products are selected with durability, strength and reliable performance criteria, supplied in accordance with national and international standards.
aboutPage.mainContentParagraph3: Our team, specialized in strapping machines, straps, industrial oils and packaging materials, works to provide the most suitable solutions to the needs of our customers.

highlights.highlight1: We provide quality packaging materials that strengthen the supply chain of our business partners
highlights.highlight2: We offer fast and effective commercial solutions with a product portfolio suitable for businesses of all sizes
highlights.highlight3: We provide reliable logistics support in import and export processes
highlights.highlight4: We always consider customer satisfaction as our priority

aboutPage.valuesFooter: In our relationships with our customers, transparency, accuracy and continuity are our core values. We work to exceed expectations with every new order.
